resources.string: Image of how far you\'ve been hanged.
Enter a character here to try your luck!
The word you need to guess will show up here!
Characters that were wrong will show up here

Rules are as followed: You are allowed 10 tries to guess the word that shows up as stars. You enter a single character in the textwindow, and click the button called Try Character. If it is correct, it will show up in the correct place in the word, if wrong it will end up in the wrong character list below the stars. The picture will also update to show long until your man is hanged.
